title: Pfizer Sales Soar on Covid-19 Vaccine Sales
sub_head: Drug giant logs 77% revenue increase helped by Covid vaccine, antiviral medications
body:
Pfizer Inc.â€™s first-quarter sales soared 77%, helped by higher revenue from its Covid-19 vaccine and antiviral medication.
The New York-based drug company logged $25.7 billion in sales in the first-quarter, driven by sales of its vaccine, Comirnaty, and Paxlovid, a pill aimed at reducing severe outcomes from the virus.
